content:
Sure! Here are the answers to the ten trivia questions I provided in my previous response:

1. The Honda Motor Company started producing automobiles in 1963.
2. The Swedish automaker Volvo was founded in 1927 by Assar Gabrielsson and Gustaf Larson.
3. The Renault-Nissan-Mitsubishi Alliance became the world's largest automaker by sales in 2017.
4. The Italian automaker Lamborghini was founded in 1963 by Ferruccio Lamborghini.
5. The Chrysler Corporation merged with Daimler-Benz to form DaimlerChrysler in 1998.
6. The American automaker Tesla was founded in 2003 by Elon Musk and a group of entrepreneurs.
7. The BMW Group acquired the British automaker Mini in 2000.
8. The French automaker Peugeot was founded in 1810 by Jean-Pierre and Jean-Frédéric Peugeot as a manufacturer of coffee mills and bicycles.
9. The PSA Group, the parent company of Peugeot and Citroën, acquired the American automaker Opel from General Motors in 2017.
10. The German automaker Porsche was founded in 1931 by Ferdinand Porsche.

I hope these answers are helpful! Let me know if you have any other questions.
